currentLevel.title: The Balance Sheet Equation
currentLevel.description: Master the fundamental accounting equation: Assets = Liabilities + Equity

gameData.scene: 🎯 Welcome to Lucy's Lemonade Stand Balance Sheet Challenge! Now that you understand equity and liabilities, let's learn the most important rule in accounting - the balance sheet equation. Every successful business owner needs to know this!
gameData.prompt: Help Lucy organize her lemonade stand's finances using the balance sheet equation. Drag each item to the correct category and make sure the equation balances: Assets = Liabilities + Equity
hints: Assets are things the business owns (cash, supplies, equipment)
Liabilities are debts the business owes to others (loans, bills to pay)
Equity is the owner's investment and retained earnings
The equation MUST balance: Total Assets = Total Liabilities + Total Equity
If the equation doesn't balance, check if items are in the wrong category

data.instructions: Drag each item to the correct category. Remember: Assets = Liabilities + Equity. The balance sheet must balance perfectly!

items.name: Loan from Parents
items.description: Money borrowed to start the business

items.name: Supplier Credit
items.description: Money owed to the grocery store

items.name: Lucy's Investment
items.description: Her own money put into the business
